title: Reason behind removing the "See More Stats" button in ranked
body:
Hi all, 

I was just wondering why Riot decided to remove the ability to look at your stats for ranked, I have tried to find a post where they stated it but I couldn't. Any help? 

Thanks

replies.body: Like previously stated, [it is a bug to do with the NCS](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select). Riot knows about it and is looking to fix it soon™.
i think its just a bug, You can see your stats on LoLking but they dont always update properly. If riot wanted to remove it they would just remove the button as well as it is clutter
